application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: Prior Telecommunications Notice for the installation of 20m pole inc. antennas, ground based apparatus and ancillary development.
site_name: Ground Floor Room 1, The Rose Lipman Building
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8e1a91e6-7fff-5d8d-42cb-fca910a35a50"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">The proposed telecommunications pole, by reason of size, scale, siting and the introduction of significant additional street furniture, would comprise an overbearing and incongruous feature which detracts from the character and appearance of the streetscene and surrounding area and would fail to preserve the character and appearance of the setting of the adjacent De Beauvoir Conservation Area and nearby locally listed buildings contrary to Hackney's LP33 (2020) policies PP1 (Public Realm),&nbsp;</span></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) and LP4 (Non Designated Heritage Assets) and London Plan (2021) policies D3 (Optimising Site Capacity through a Design Led Approach), D4 (Delivering Good Design) and HC1 (Heritage Conservation and Growth) and Hackney Public Realm Strategy (2012).</span><br></p>
